Opinion | Brian McGrory

A season for the ages

In a sport devoted to individual stardom, these Celtics define selflessness. In an era of convenience, they are about perseverance.

Mass. teachers union agrees
to give up key rights on seniority

In return for giving up rights that determine how teachers are promoted and placed in schools, a far more sweeping ballot initiative will be dropped.
